overview: See Lionel's classic steam switchers from the scale and semi-scale switchers of the prewar era to the high-tech models of the modern era. Then check out Lionel's irresistible operating and action cars like the milk and cattle cars, the merchandise car, poultry dispatch, and more. Also see what trains and accessories would have looked like had they been produced as pictured in the catalog, and much more.
title: Lionel Nation No. 6
